name: A small bloodstained cross
data: It increases the users wisdom like a god.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'harm body'.
